urlLink well,how`d you like this photo w/ my catch?.... urlLink

well, how to say it this,,,its sort of "taboo", but lets c then,... first four years of stayin here w/ my previous family,,,gud boy pa c me, dont even know where the red district is or is there any pub around for foreigners. Cut it short after my family went home, and left here alone, hten i started to roam around and c what singapore is about. Its a businessworkd over here, everybody`s got to work for $$$, discovered the red district,and girls are asking %20.00 short time for 20 minuites,,,"how to do?" then the rest is history, of me,,,,... A lot of our kababayan here specially those in tourist visas,shortime stay are also secretly workin here in pubs and alike. Some who is lucky enuf manage to be married to a local and become a resident here, af ter that,,,,its history again,....hehehehe,,, its hard to continue, coz its really taboo,.. u got to be here and leave here to know. There`s a lot of those typical stories here. So, how,,,would you like to stay here and see for yourself?

well, here youll see some profile about me,,,and my work, how i see people specially sa mga "kababayan ko". There are also some suggestive things regarding your home renovation if your currently doin your house now, some tips, comment as nad suggestions. See for your self..

...it is not easy to be one, i should know,coz ive been a father once, i had 2 girls and now i couldnt even see them,....its personal but just let you figure it out... a father is somebody who is a very good provider, a hard worker for his goals and dreams,w/c is primarily hes family. A father is someone who you could depend on of whatever it is, financially ,spiritually, intellectually. But through the hard times a father should be assisted by his wife her personal friend and confidant. a person who you can depend on wether times are bad and easy. A father, is still a father wether he goes far away from home and long to come back for the reason of hope and fulfillment, who is trying hes way to stay survive in order for hes family to survive. A wife should always be there caring for there kids and telling them things not to forget there father, for whatever it is ,,,hope shouldnt be forgotten, faith should always stay strong, and will should always be the inspiration to keep" a father become a father ."
